```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(modelr)
library(performance)
library(purrr)

set.seed(1)
```

```{r}
# Import data
crime_df <- 
  read_csv("./data/crime_df.csv")
```

## Distribution of target variable `crime_per1k`
```{r}
# The plot shows lambda = 1, so no transformation needed
crime_df <- 
  crime_df %>% 
  select(-c(1:3))

par(mar = c(1, 1, 1, 1))

fit1 <- lm(crime_per1k ~ ., data = crime_df)
MASS::boxcox(fit1, lambda = seq(-3, 3, by = .25))
```

```{r}
step(fit1, direction = "both")
```


## Predictors selection from EDA
`poverty`, `regionNorth`, `regionSouth`, `per_doc`, `per_bed`
```{r}
# Check collinearity between predictors
check_collinearity(fit1)
```

# Fit models
```{r}
mod1 <- lm(crime_per1k ~ poverty + region + per_doc + per_bed+ per_doc * per_bed + poverty * region + poverty * per_doc + poverty * per_bed, data = crime_df)

par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(mod1)

summary(mod1)

mod2 <- lm(formula = crime_per1k ~ pop18 + bagrad + poverty + pcincome + region + per_area + per_bed + 
             pop18 * bagrad + poverty * region + , data = crime_df)
summary(mod2)
```


# Preditive ability
## Need to be modified
```{r}
cv_df = crossv_mc(crime_df, 10)

cv_df <- 
  cv_df %>% 
  mutate(
    train = map(train, as_tibble),
    test = map(test, as_tibble))
```

```{r}
cv_df = 
  cv_df %>% 
  mutate(
    linear_mod  = map(train, ~lm(crime_per1k ~ poverty + region + per_doc + per_bed + pop18 + per_doc * per_bed + poverty * region + region * pop18 + poverty * region * per_bed * per_doc * pop18, data = .x))) %>% 
  mutate(
    rmse_linear = map2_dbl(linear_mod, test, ~ rmse(model = .x, data = .y)))
```
